1st International Workshop on MLverse: A Responsible, Scalable, Lifelong, Multi-Agent Learning Perspective on Metaverse

20 July 2022, Online

Colocated with ICML 2022

The MLverse workshop is co-located with ICML 2022, which takes place on July 20, 2022 online.

The goal of MLverse workshop is to bring together leaders from multi-disciplinary backgrounds, including games, philosophy, ethics, machine learning, and distributed systems, to inform the problems that machine learning theorists and practitioners need to solve in the next decade to build out the Metaverse.

Call for Papers

...

...

...

Scope:

The topics of interest include, but are not limited to:

  • Philosophical, ethical, and societal considerations
  • Gaming, Conversational AI, and HCI
  • Distributed ML (federated learning, multi-agent learning)
  • ML Foundations (RL, robustness, multimodality, lifelong learning)
